018package org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc;
019
020import static java.lang.String.format;
021import static java.lang.System.err;
022import static java.lang.System.out;
023import static java.lang.System.setProperty;
024import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.IncludeTaglet.PROPERTY_INCLUDE_ROOT_PREFIX;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.ToDoTaglet.PROPERTY_TODO_BASE;
027
028import java.io.File;
029import java.io.IOException;
030import java.util.IllegalFormatException;
031
032import org.apiguardian.api.API;
033import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
034import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.annotation.ProgramClass;
035import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.exception.PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError;
036
037/**
038 *  If a program will be started from IntelliJ IDEA, the {@code args} argument
039 *  to
040 *  {@link #main(String...)}
041 *  has always values.
042 *
043 *  @version $Id: IdeaStarter.java 977 2022-01-06 11:41:03Z tquadrat $
044 *
045 *  @author Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
046 *  @since 0.1.0
047 */
048@ProgramClass
049@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: IdeaStarter.java 977 2022-01-06 11:41:03Z tquadrat $" )
050@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
051public final class IdeaStarter
052{
053        /*--------------*\
054    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
055        \*--------------*/
056    /**
057     *  No instance allowed for this class!
058     */
059    private IdeaStarter() { throw new PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError( IdeaStarter.class ); }
060
061        /*---------*\
062    ====** Methods **==========================================================
063        \*---------*/
064    /**
065     * The program entry point.
066     *
067     * @param args The command line arguments.
068     */
069    @SuppressWarnings( "CallToPrintStackTrace" )
070    public static final void main( final String... args )
071    {
072        //noinspection TryWithIdenticalCatches
073        try
074        {
075            final var currentDir = new File( "." ).getCanonicalFile().getAbsoluteFile();
076            out.printf( "Current Directory: %s%n", currentDir.getAbsolutePath() );
077            final var workDir = new File( currentDir, "org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc" ).getCanonicalFile().getAbsoluteFile();
078            out.printf( "Work Directory   : %s%n", workDir.getAbsolutePath() );
079
080            var rootDirKey = format( "%s.%s", PROPERTY_INCLUDE_ROOT_PREFIX, "source" );
081            setProperty( rootDirKey, new File( currentDir, "org.tquadrat.foundation.showcase/src/main/java" ).getAbsolutePath() );
082
083            rootDirKey = format( "%s.%s", PROPERTY_INCLUDE_ROOT_PREFIX, "javadoc" );
084            setProperty( rootDirKey, new File( currentDir, "org.tquadrat.foundation.showcase/src/main/javadoc" ).getAbsolutePath() );
085
086            rootDirKey = format( "%s.%s", PROPERTY_INCLUDE_ROOT_PREFIX, "resources" );
087            setProperty( rootDirKey, new File( currentDir, "org.tquadrat.foundation.showcase/src/main/resources" ).getAbsolutePath() );
088
089            setProperty( PROPERTY_TODO_BASE, new File( currentDir, "org.tquadrat.foundation.showcase" ).getAbsolutePath() );
090            JavadocStarter.main( new File( workDir, "data/javadoc.options" ).getCanonicalFile().getAbsolutePath() );
091        }
092        catch( final IllegalFormatException | IOException e )
093        {
094            e.printStackTrace( err );
095        }
096        catch( final Throwable t )
097        {
098            //---* Handle previously unhandled exceptions *--------------------
099            t.printStackTrace( err );
100        }
101    }  //  main()
102}
103//  class IdeaStarter
104
105/*
106 *  End of File
107 */
